alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:21AM CDT until March 25 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Strong River At D`lo affecting Simpson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Strong River At D`lo. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water begins backing up into Sellers Creek in Mendenhall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 25.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Strong River D`lo 25.0 21.6 Wed 8 am CDT 25.0 22.8 17.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
